title: Ephraim Tjihonge
text:
Ephraim Tjihonge (born 23 May 1986) is a <a href="Namibia">Namibia</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who currently plays for <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a>n <a href="National%20First%20Division">National First Division</a> club <a href="Milano%20United">Milano United</a>.
He previously played for South African clubs <a href="African%20Warriors">African Warriors</a> and <a href="Black%20Leopards">Black Leopards</a>. In Namibia he played for <a href="SK%20Windhoek">SK Windhoek</a>, <a href="Civics%20FC">Civics FC</a> and <a href="Black%20Africa%20F.C.">Black Africa</a>.
He was a part of the <a href="Namibia%20national%20football%20team">Namibian</a> squad at the <a href="2008%20African%20Cup%20of%20Nations">2008 African Cup of Nations</a>. He also represented Namibia in a March 2011 friendly against <a href="Botswana%20national%20football%20team">Botswana</a>.
